title: 386 5 "Hatred of the Straw Hat Crew – Enter Iron Mask Duval"Transliteration: "Mugiwara Ichimi Nikushi – Tekkamen no Dyubaru Tōjō" (Japanese:麦わら一味憎し 鉄仮面のデュバル登場) Sumio Watanabe Koga Naoki January 25, 2009(2009-01-25)[13][15] —
transformers_text: 386 5 Hatred of the Straw Hat Crew Enter Iron Mask Duval Transliteration Mugi war a Ichi mi Ni kush i Tek kamen no D yu baru T j Japanese Sumi o Watanabe Koga Naoki January 25 2009 2009 01 25 13 15 C amie and Papp a gu introduce themselves to the Straw Hats who then later find out that their fish man friend has been kidnapped by Iron Mask Duval and the Macro Gang The Straw Hats set out to rescue him and are attacked by Duval's henchmen the Flying Fish Riders When they recognise the Straw Hats ' flag they retreat and in form Duval that the man who ruined his life is approaching and he replies that he can't wait to have his revenge
tf_idf_text: hatred straw hat crew enter iron mask duval transliteration mugi war ichi kush tek kamen baru japanese sumi watanabe koga naoki january amie papp introduce straw hat later find fish man friend kidnap iron mask duval macro gang straw hat set rescue attack duvals henchman fly fish rider recognise straw hat flag retreat form duval man ruin life approach reply cant wait revenge
